msbt.message: Hey, you gonna enter today's Bug-Off, ?Just a quick heads-up. It's super easy to miss bugs sitting on flowers or chillin' out on the water.Keep your eyes peeled out there!

The Bug-Off's all about seein' how many bugs you can catch before time's up, .But I can't just charge in like normal, or I'll scare the bugs off. Gotta take my timebut not TOO much time.Ahh, tryin' to plan ahead won't get me anywhere! I'll just wing it and hope for the best!

None of the other kids were as brave as me when it came to catchin' bugs, .I'd grab any bug with my bare hands. Spiders, scorpions, beetles, most of the lazier flies I never flinched!Ahh, the good ol' days.
Flick's over in the plaza today for the Bug-Off, .I'm psyched to see how it all turns out! Are you gonna go for it?
I like bugs. They pick up pollen from flowers and spread it around.Anything that helps the flowers around here is OK in my book, !
